title: Ticket #6081: RPM: ensure policycoreutils-python is installed for SELinux
description: The post install script for HTCondor could fail if policycoreutils-python is not installed. When adding HTCondor to an existing system, this is not a problem. However, when installing everything at once has shown problems in OSG's testing environment.
remarks:
2017-Jan-18 10:12:16 by tim:
This fixes most issues. However, the OSG test from a totally new install still has a problem on CentOS 7. Not reproducible in a VM.

2017-Jan-19 08:05:36 by tim:
Must also have an up to date selinux-policy-targeted.

2017-Jan-20 13:25:22 by blin:
Code Review:

This probably isn't a big deal but requiring 'selinux-policy-targeted-3.13.1-102" may be a little aggressive since all we know is that there were failures with 3.13.1-60 and no failures with 3.13.1-102. It would be best if we knew the exact revision where it was fixed.

That being said, the above is very nitpicky, and the commits in this ticket have fixed all issues that the OSG is seeing in our automated testing.
